name: Oliver Zhang
routine: Oliver Zhang usually goes to bed at 11pm and wakes up at 6am for his morning meditation.
occupation: Oliver Zhang is a financial analyst who typically works from 9am to 7pm in a competitive firm.
thoughts: Oliver Zhang is contemplating investing in the stock market following a recent financial seminar he attended on February 1st.
lifestyle: Oliver Zhang prefers minimalist living and spends a lot of time reading and enhancing his professional knowledge.

name: Natalia Ivanova
routine: Natalia sleeps at 11pm and wakes up at 5:30 am to begin her day.
occupation: She is a seasoned pediatrician who works at a clinic from 8am until 5pm.
thoughts: Natalia recently attended a medical seminar which made her ponder about the integration of artificial intelligence in healthcare. She has been reflecting on this since February 1st, 2024.
lifestyle: She maintains a balanced diet with a preference for organic food. Natalia enjoys gardening in her free time and has a diverse collection of houseplants. She likes to unwind by playing the piano after dinner.

name: Tariq Al Zahid
routine: Tariq usually sleeps around 2 am after studying and wakes up at 9 am for university classes.
occupation: Tariq Al Zahid is a medical student who spends the majority of his day in lectures, labs, and studying.
thoughts: He's been worrying about his upcoming exams starting on February 2nd, 2024.
lifestyle: As a student, Tariq leads a hectic lifestyle focused on learning, with little time for home activities.
